key_themes: Institutional capital flows and 401k deferrals supporting equity strength
Crypto institutional adoption and ETF approval momentum
Fed rate policy uncertainty and defensive positioning
Valuation concerns and breadth deterioration warnings
Sector rotation between cyclicals and defensives
risk_factors: Nasdaq breadth deterioration despite index strength signals underlying weakness
US stock market cap-to-GDP at record 218% creates valuation compression risk
Geopolitical escalation (Taiwan semiconductors, Russia-Ukraine) as primary volatility trigger
Fed hawkish pivot would pressure equity multiples and derail rate-cut thesis
Earnings disappointments in fintech and software sectors showing demand softness
